DOC.brief_summary: To establish bioequivalence fix dose combination 40 mg telmisartan / 12.5 mg HCTZ vs. monocomponents
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Telmisartan / HCTZ Fixed Dose Combination Compared Its Monocomponents Healthy Male Volunteers
